enemy

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameObject.GameObject
      • gameObject.MovableObject
        • enemy.Enemy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy_1_1, Enemy_1_2, Enemy_1_3, Enemy_2_1, Enemy_3_1, Enemy_3_2, Enemy_4, Enemy_Boss_1, Enemy_Boss_2, Enemy_Boss_2_small, Enemy_Boss_3, Enemy_Boss_5

    public abstract class Enemy
extends MovableObject
    Description:
    Contains the attributes and data of the enemy
    Data is adjusted based on other factors such as AI and other players
    Since:
    2014-03-31
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Team 6

        public boolean chargeAtPlayer(int speed,
                              int duration)
        At the appropriate time and distance, the enemy will charge at the player at a specific speed and direction

        Inputs:
        speed - the rate at which the enemy travels over time
        duration - the time that the enemy charges at the character
        Parameters:
        speed - charge speed
        duration - charge duration
        Returns:
        boolean whether the object will start a charge
